QuestData.Title: Lieutenant of the Tower
QuestData.Description: All of your instincts were correct. Gul'dan raised Lord Ravencrest, and his ghostly army, from beyond the grave. Now, they serve the Legion, protecting secrets within the tower.$B$BAlthough Ravencrest commands from above, Lieutenant Desdel Stareye operates the prisons.$B$BHe tormented me these past few moons, but I did not yield.$B$B<Maiev runs a finger along her curved blade.>$B$BHis life must be ended.
QuestData.RewardText: Lord Stareye came from a noble house, but in war, he never came close to Ravencrest or my brother.$B$BNow that he is defeated, we can turn our attention to his commander.$B$BHowever, that will be no easy task. We must gather our strength before facing Lord Ravencrest himself.
